text: The place is quite big with enough space for a group gathering or chill spot. There's a pool table in there where you can play with and the Karoke system is good. Price wise it's affordable and the staff there are as mentioned friendly and attentive. A great place to unwind or relax. 10/10 place to be honest.

A place to challenge oneself with many good pool players in this pub while enjoying the karaoke and beer at the same time. Nice 8 foot table with tight corner pockets. It take more accuracy to pot in the ball.

Wonderful place for a night of chill out and wind down. Superb services & reasonable prices. Friendly crowd, service crews and bosses whom are all very nice people as well. Believe it or not, find out yourself!

One of the most friendliest pub around Serangoon Gardens. After the first time I feel like home whenever I go there. It's like those everyone knows everyone and it's never lack of kakis even if u go alone.
Enjoy going there for drinks and meeting friends. Boss is very friendly too.
